name: Eclipse Survivors
description:
Eclipse Survivors is a challenging bullet-hell / area shooter game where you face thousands of enemies and face powerful bosses.

CONFRONT MIGHTY BOSSES!

CHOOSE YOUR SKILLS

UPGRADE YOUR SHIP

Features

  • Select from a diverse range of 20 unique and powerful weapons, each with its distinct advantages and unleash mayhem on your enemies!
  • Customize your ship with an advanced upgrade system and dominate the competition with unmatched power and agility!
  • Confront 5 formidable bosses, each with their unique strengths and weaknesses, and put your skills to the ultimate test!
